tweet_text: If your employees are seriously underperforming while working from home to the extent that you think they're "taking advantage" in the middle of a pandemic, I would suggest looking at your culture, which almost certainly is geared towards middle-micromanagers.

tweet_text: @drgrinstead @nathaliejacoby1 My favorite response is one I've read on the Internet, though I haven't had the chance (or nerve) to try it myself. When someone calls you a sheep, lower your mask, spit at their feet, and say, "There. Now I'm a llama."
